name: Sugoi Labs
tagline: We develop delightful products over mobile and Web
description:
Sugoi – is a Japanese word which means “Awesome”.
At Sugoi Labs, we take pride in our name and work and stand true to it.
We are a team of passionate individuals with a common purpose of customer satisfaction and providing comfort of doing business by building experience-rich web and mobile applications. We have developed and delivered apps across categories such as Fin-Tech, Social, Education, Ecommerce/marketplace and business management solutions with varied complexities.
 
We like to collaborate with our clients as their partners, a partner who is continuously brainstorming along with them on the product to make it better. We understand the nuances of customer insight, business objectives and overall vision that play an impact on the product development and that is the reason why we leave no stone unturned to ensure collaborating with us helps you build a successful product and a sustainable business.

We want to contribute to the success of a technology product that makes us successful every day!
